Address.Address1: Cankurtaran Mh. Akbiyik Cd. Cetinkaya Sk. No:1

Description.Text: Osmanhan Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Sultanahmet area. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Osmanhan Hotel caters to your needs.
